org.gbif.api.model.common.search

Class SearchRequest<P extends SearchParameter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.PageableBase
      • org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pageable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatasetSuggestRequest, FacetedSearchRequest, NameUsageSuggestRequest, OccurrenceSearchRequest

    public class SearchRequest<P extends SearchParameter>
extends PageableBase
    Generic request class for search operations. This class contains a list of parameters, a list of desired facets and paging options (page size and offset).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.PageableBase
